description:
dashboard: tidy up 'top' link.

The previous link worked, but was unnecessary and had a trailing "}".

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM On Thu, Feb 16, 2012 at 5:10 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > > Description: > dashboard: tidy up 'top' link. > > The previous link worked, but was unnecessary and had a trailing "}". > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5674068/ > > Affected files: > M misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.**html > > > Index: misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.**html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.**html > +++ b/misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.**html > @@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ > } > .build .hash { > font-family: monospace; > - font-size: 9pt; > + font-size: 9pt; > } > .build .result { > text-align: center; > @@ -128,7 +128,7 @@ >
> **end}}>prev > {else}}class="inactive"{{end}}**>next > - > **top > + top a> >
> {{end}} > > > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=63ed249fba24 ***

dashboard: tidy up 'top' link.

The previous link worked, but was unnecessary and had a trailing "}".

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5674068
I much prefer this as ?page=0, but whatever.

subject: code review 5674068: dashboard: tidy up 'top' link.
